3.post_text: Our McDonald's Player Escorts - Christopher, Jovan, and Nadir, had the dream chance to walk hand-in-hand with the Colombian team, out on to the pitch for their match with Uruguay. What an experience! Here's a sneak peek into their trip to Brazil.

5.post_text:
In April, we put our crew to the test and challenged them to perform their best in restaurant operations. All for the chance to fly to Brazil to catch a FIFA World Cup match! With hard work and dedication, Sreed and Arasu became winners of our Crew World Cup! 

Now in Brazil, here's a sneak peek at their trip. They even had the chance to get a glimpse of the actual 2014 FIFA World Cup trophy!

6.post_text: Our McDonald's Player Escorts - Christopher, Jovan, and Nadir have landed in Brazil, and had a fun-filled first day! They met fellow Player Escorts from Colombia, India, and Italy, and visited the home of Brazilian football club, Flamengo Regatta Club. Later, it was an exciting cable car ride to the top of Rio de Janeiro's iconic Sugarloaf Mountain for breathtaking views of the city.

7.post_text:
Here’s a peek into our Samba Celebration Weekend Carnivals! 

We’ll be hosting one final weekend of football and fun so don’t forget to join us at tomorrow’s carnival. Show us your penalty shoot-out and football juggling skills, and play a game of table soccer with us for the chance to win some fun prizes! 

Venue: McDonald’s Jurong Central Park 
Time: 10am – 2pm 

See you there!

8.post_text:
TGIF! 

From 2pm – 4pm today, we’ll be at McCafé Tampines Street 32 to give out 100 free Double Chocolate Frappes (medium) to the first 100 customers. 

From 6pm – 8pm this evening, we’ll be giving out 100 free Cappuccinos (small) to the first 100 customers at McCafé Downtown East! :D 

*Redemption is limited to one cup per customer, while stocks last.

9.post_text:
Ordering in for tonight’s World Cup matches? 

Remember - When you use your Citibank Visa Credit Card to place your McDelivery orders online or via the McDelivery app, you stand a daily* chance to win $1000 in cash! 

This promotion is applicable for orders of at least $20 on food and drink in a single receipt, and is valid from 5 June to 16 July.

*Winners will be drawn on a weekly basis

10.post_text:
Going once, going twice…

Our Charity Auction for our six 2-feet* Hello Kitty Plush Toys will close at 9pm tonight, so bid now for a good cause http://bit.ly/1ibuOu7!
  
All net proceeds** will be donated to Ronald McDonald House Charities® (RMHC) Singapore. 
 
* Approximate. Heights of individual toys may vary. For the exact height, please see FAQs or Terms and Conditions on the auction pages.
** Net proceeds means the total proceeds received by McDonald’s from the Auction, less bank charges, PayPal charges, commissions, delivery charges, Auction audit fees and applicable taxes.

14.post_text:
Are you lovin’ the 2014 FIFA World Cup? We’re continuing to bring all the World Cup fun and excitement to you. 

If you haven’t already, be sure to join us at our final Samba Celebration Weekend Carnival this Saturday and immerse yourself in an afternoon of football and fun!

Our Soccer Buddies will also be roaming our restaurants this weekend to reward you for having some World Cup fun with us! 
- Have a refreshing Fiesta Lime McFizz as an after-lunch treat, and show us your football juggling skills in the evening on Friday
- Be spotted with our Brazilian-inspired burgers for lunch, and do a dance with our Soccer Buddies in the evening on Saturday
- Get a taste of Brazil with any item from our special World Cup menu for lunch, and exchange jerseys with our Soccer Buddies in the evening on Sunday. 

Are you game enough?

17.post_text:
McDonald’s salutes all SAF personnel! To show our appreciation, McDonald’s will be offering a free upsize* with each purchase of an Extra Value Meal for SAF personnel visiting our restaurants from 11am to 11.59pm on SAF Day, on Tuesday, 1 July. 
 
To be eligible for redemption, simply be in your uniform, or flash your 11B. 
 
*Redemption is limited to one free upsize per SAF personnel

24.post_text:
You may have seen our adorable 2-feet* Hello Kitty Bubbly World plush toys located in 6 of our restaurants islandwide. Now, you can get the chance to own them – for a good cause!

We will be having all 6 Hello Kitty Bubbly World designs up for auction here on this page. All net proceeds** will be donated to Ronald McDonald House Charities® (RMHC) Singapore! Auction starts tomorrow, 20 June 2014 at 11 am so stay tuned!

Auction closes on 26 June 2014 at 9 pm.  

* Approximate. Heights of individual toys may vary. For the exact height, please see FAQs or Terms and Conditions.
** Net proceeds means the total proceeds received by McDonald’s from the Auction, less bank charges, PayPal charges, commissions, delivery charges, Auction audit fees and applicable taxes.
